@Ripclaw187 --- to run this using RGH all that has to be done once extracted is to place it in the content/0000000000 folder? Please confirm, thanks!

@alexjrcasado I tested game through xexmenu and freestyledash (pressing default.xex) and both asked "Please insert Single Player Disk". to play the game without that problem inside freestyledash settings set the scan to the location of the game. Then inside XBOX 360 Games choose game. Also unless you download and install the HD Texture Content press B when the game asks to install it. Hope this helps.
The above comment was to mat2209 not alexjrcasado.

sorry alexjrcasado for the long wait. I tried everything I could think of to get the game to load correctly in xexmenu and nothing worked. So, I uploaded freestyledash and a quick install txt to help you with this problem. Hope this helps you and anyone else whose having the same problem.

Are you going into Xbox360games and clicking icon or file manager and clicking on default.xex? Game won't work if you click on default.xex.
yes iam going into Xbox360games and starting  it from there

Sorry I can't figure out what you are doing wrong but it's clear it's on your side. I tried it on my jtag and two rgh consoles and worked every time. My only suggestion is to delete the HD Texture DLC (Content/0000000000000000/45410993) and then try it the way I said. I also noticed disk 2 doesn't show up in Xbox 360 Games but in Homebrew inside Freestyle Dash. If that doesn't help then find and download Disk 1.                          

good luck

Make sure your DashLaunch is current. I'm on DashLaunch V3.02 (459)
So does it work or not?????

Ripclaw187   bro i used DashLaunch V3.02 (459) but this cannot swap the disc. 
enable the auto swap in behaviour and also add swap.xex plugins but cant work help me plz

Freestyle 3 is out people. Update to kernel 16179, install dashlaunch 3.03 and Freestyle 3. Works fine. Freestlye 2.2 is old, and cruddy. Freestyle 3 is much faster, and does a far better job swapping discs. Don't enable the dashlaunch disk swap AND use freestyle or you'll have problems with newer titles such as this.

The title works. Freestyle Dash 3 revision 58 is out. Use that. I use it, and works. Dashlaunch 3.03 is also out. If you try to use freestyle disk swap, and the dashlaunch disk swap plugin, you'll have issues. Freestyle 3 is FAR superior to it's predecessor and is readily available in the usual places (except auto xbins, u wont find it there - yet).
thanks for the info azuziel.
